Header.paragraph: A four-day event, will take place on 10-13 June, 2023, in Thessaloniki’s most upscale restaurants!

About.paragraph: Organized to promote Thessaloniki as a culinary destination, the festival is a perfect assemblage of food, fun and entertainment. Expect to experience culinary workshops, music performances, master classes, food events, and of course, delicious, mouthwatering food!

Testimonials.text: "The White Tower of Thessaloniki is a monument and museum on the waterfront of the city of Thessaloniki. It was built in the fifteenth century after the fall of Thessaloniki to the Ottomans in 1430."
Testimonials.name: White Tower

Testimonials.text: "A city with plenty of museums like Archaeological Museum, Museum of Byzantine Culture, Photography Museum, Museum of Cinema, and even more in order to discover the rich city’s history."
Testimonials.name: Museums

Testimonials.text: "Modiano and Kapani markets are the best destination for shopping local products such as olives, spices, herbs, traditional Greek cheeses, and even meat or fish. It’s also the perfect place to have your lunch, as there are many typical Greek taverns."
Testimonials.name: Markets

Testimonials.text: "There is always time for a little shopping and you can definitely enjoy luxury, fashionable boutiques in Proxenou Koromila, Mitropoleos streets, and also the classic choices in Tsimiki, Ermou and Egnatia streets."
Testimonials.name: Shopping

Testimonials.text: "There are several churches in Thessaloniki dating back thousands of years. Some of the best churches that are worth a visit are Hagios Demetrios, Hagia Sophia, Agios Pavlos, The Church of Panagia Chalkeon."
Testimonials.name: Churches

Testimonials.text: "Thessaloniki's gastronomy is widely known for its quality and rich variety. A journey through the history of this important trading port is an encounter with empires – Hellenistic, Roman, Byzantine and Ottoman – and vibrant communities, each of which has left their mark on the city’s cuisine."
Testimonials.name: Gastronomy

Features.title: PRICE SPECIALS
Features.text: Michelin-starred restaurants, upscale spots and the coolest canteens will offer exclusive discounts of up to 40%.

Features.title: INTERNATIONAL FLAVOURS
Features.text: Enjoy a unique international mix of flavours with restaurants offering from exclusive tasting menus to “good-to-go” street food.

Features.title: FINE DINING OR “GOOD-TO-GO”?
Features.text: During the festival period, the city’s coolest eating spots will open their doors to create unique menus, master classes, food events and food-to-go.

Features.title: FESTIVAL FOR FOODIES
Features.text: From awesome local cuisine with Mediterranean flair, to international flavours such as Vietnamese Baobuns, Middle East’ Falafels, and fine French and Italian dining, there is an overflow of food offerings to cater for every taste.
